content:
About Community Dinners

Welcome to the Community Dinners website! This platform helps our community coordinate dinner events, making it easy to organize meals, volunteer, and connect with each other.

How It Works

Community Dinners uses a simple approach to help organize our regular community meals:

Simple Login

Just enter your name to login or register. No passwords needed - we keep things simple and friendly!

Dinner Details

Each dinner has details like date, time, location, and theme. Any logged-in user can update these details.

Menu Coordination

Sign up to bring food items in different categories:

  • Main dishes
  • Side dishes
  • Drinks
  • Appetizers
  • Supplies (plates, utensils, etc.)

Volunteer

We need help with setup and cleanup for each dinner. Click the "Sign Up" button in the Volunteers section to lend a hand!

RSVP System

Let us know you're coming by RSVPing with your party size. The system will calculate a recommended donation based on the ages of attendees.

Notes

Use the Notes section to communicate with other attendees about the dinner.

Editing This Page

This About page can be edited by any logged-in user. Just click the "Edit Content" button below to make changes using the simple editor.
